name: qualidade-de-software-s206
description: Repositório dedicado a matéria de Qualidade de Software

scripts.test:e2e:report: npm run cypress:run && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.report:golf: mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/golf-report.json && marge cypress/reports/golf-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename golf-report
scripts.test:golf:report: npm run cypress:run:golf && npm run report:golf
